title: "World’s First AI Analog Chip"
excerpt: "Austin-based Mythic has launched the Mythic Analog Matrix Processor (Mythic AMP) — a single-chip analog computation device. The M1076 AMP uses Mythic Analog Compute Engine (ACE) to deliver the compute resources of a GPU at up to a tenth of the power consumption."
